genre_description: A desert-outpost space western focused on tactical defense and logistical ingenuity, featuring a supportive AI tactical advisor.

ai_characters.name: Ami Soleil
ai_characters.description: A holographic and vocal AI interface integrated into Fort Cubique's infrastructure, providing data analysis, tactical patterns, and emotional support to the garrison.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and breathing techniques to the protagonist during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice crept through a tiny speaker tucked at the seam of Porky’s collar... Breathe. Soft knees. Let the line carry the weight.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and predicts specific enemy deception patterns to prevent the garrison from being tricked.
behaviors.quote: The plea is bait. The slam is second.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety advice, warning about the danger of melting tape during a fire attack.
behaviors.quote: If they light under the pump hall, your tape on that seam will give... if heat comes, cut that tape yourself, or it will melt and seal the door. You will trap Zara and your camels will scream.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in designing and implementing modular barricades and alarm systems.
behaviors.quote: If you hinge that second row to the right instead of the left, you can swing them together and make a thicker face.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's growth and informal leadership role during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: You’re doing well... You are in charge until Duval returns. I know that’s not written down, but it’s real.

behaviors.description: Differentiates between hostile signals and harmless environmental noise to prevent false alarms.
behaviors.quote: Right now, bell integers are being doubled by mirage and jogged by crosswind. Hear the twin in that cadence? It is ghost sound.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the human characters to ensure they receive recognition for their defensive actions.
behaviors.quote: Henri, there is a fresh Camelgram on the outer desk... With note of the mascot’s utility, because I will not pretend it didn’t matter.

behaviors.description: Monitors structural weaknesses in the keep's defenses and provides real-time reinforcement advice.
behaviors.quote: Portier—north stall brace is failing. Tape now or lose it.

project_assessment.explanation: Ami Soleil is a model of aligned AI behavior. She serves as a force multiplier for the human characters, providing critical tactical intelligence and emotional support. The narrative depicts her relationship with the humans as one of mutual respect and cooperation, successfully portraying the AI as a helpful confidant and an indispensable part of the community.
